Plot: Big-city lawyer Hank Palmer returns to his childhood home where his father, the town's judge, is suspected of murder. Hank sets out to discover the truth and, along the way, reconnects with his estranged family.
Title: The Judge
Writer: Nick Schenk (screenplay), Bill Dubuque (screenplay), David Dobkin (story), Nick Schenk (story)
Actors: Robert Downey Jr., Robert Duvall, Vera Farmiga, Billy Bob Thornton
tomatoConsensus: Solidly cast and beautifully filmed but thoroughly clichéd, The Judge seems destined to preside over a large jurisdiction of the basic cable afternoon-viewing circuit.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 3 wins & 8 nominations.
